        Subscript N = m_ * n_;
        Subscript i;
    #ifdef TNT_UNROLL_LOOPS
        Subscript Nmod4 = N & 3;
        Subscript N4 = N - Nmod4;

        for (i=0; i<N4; i+=4)
        {
            v_[i] = v[i];
            v_[i+1] = v[i+1];
            v_[i+2] = v[i+2];
            v_[i+3] = v[i+3];

            v_[i] = v[i];
    #else
        for (i=0; i< N; i++)
            v_[i] = v[i];
    #endif

template<class T>
void TNT::Matrix< T >::destroy (  )  [inline, protected]

Definition at line 147 of file cmat.h.

Referenced by TNT::Matrix< NTreal >::newsize(), TNT::Matrix< NTreal >::operator=(), and TNT::Matrix< NTreal >::~Matrix().

    {     
        /* do nothing, if no memory has been previously allocated */
        if (v_ == NULL) return ;

        /* if we are here, then matrix was previously allocated */
        if (v_ != NULL) delete [] (v_);     
        if (row_ != NULL) delete [] (row_);

        /* return rowm1_ back to original value */
        rowm1_ ++;
        if (rowm1_ != NULL ) delete [] (rowm1_);
    }

void TNT::Matrix< T >::initialize ( Subscript  M,
Subscript  N 
) [inline, protected]

Definition at line 70 of file cmat.h.

Referenced by TNT::Matrix< NTreal >::Matrix(), TNT::Matrix< NTreal >::newsize(), and TNT::Matrix< NTreal >::operator=().

    {
        mn_ = M*N;
        m_ = M;
        n_ = N;

        v_ = new T[mn_]; 
        row_ = new T*[M];
        rowm1_ = new T*[M];

        assert(v_  != NULL);
        assert(row_  != NULL);
        assert(rowm1_ != NULL);

        T* p = v_;              
        vm1_ = v_ - 1;
        for (Subscript i=0; i<M; i++)
        {
            row_[i] = p;
            rowm1_[i] = p-1;
            p += N ;
            
        }

        rowm1_ -- ;     // compensate for 1-based offset
    }

Definition at line 230 of file cmat.h.

    {
        if (v_ == A.v_)
            return *this;

        if (m_ == A.m_  && n_ == A.n_)      // no need to re-alloc
            copy(A.v_);

        else
        {
            destroy();
            initialize(A.m_, A.n_);
            copy(A.v_);
        }

        return *this;
    }
